hypothesis_content.title: High-Profile Bearish Commentary Contrarian Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following public, high-profile bearish declarations on Bitcoin from major financial figures (e.g., Peter Schiff) disseminated via major news outlets, BTC price will show positive abnormal returns over the next 3 trading days, particularly if the declaration occurs during a neutral or mildly bearish short-term trend.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High-profile bearish calls often act as a contrary indicator, signaling a potential sentiment extreme. When combined with short-term oversold conditions (low RSI) and a lack of a strong downtrend (price near 20-day SMA), it suggests the bearish news is being absorbed rather than accelerating a decline. The cited Peter Schiff headline is a direct example.
entry_conditions: Major news headline containing a definitive bearish price prediction from a recognized financial figure
BTC 4-hour RSI(14) < 40 at time of news
BTC trading within +/- 8% of its 20-day SMA
Entry: Next 4-hour candle open after news confirmation
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Average 3-day return after signal is ≤ 0% or Sharpe ratio is negative across a sample of 20+ historical similar events.
